title: Create a Process Map
description: Based on a workshop transcript describing a client's procurement process, an agent must create a visual process map.

tasks.description: Analyze the transcript to identify all the steps, decision points, and actors in the procurement process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly lists all process steps (e.g., 'Create PR', 'Manager Approval', 'Create PO') and who performs them.

tasks.description: Structure the identified steps and decision points into a logical sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly orders the process flow.

tasks.description: Generate a process map diagram (e.g., using Mermaid syntax) representing the flow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a valid and logically correct process map diagram.
